sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>0.1</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.glideapp.report_page_hdrftr" name="Report - PDF Page Header Footer Templates" version="0.1" state="published" provider_name="ServiceNow"> <requires> <import plugin="com.glideapp.report"/> <import plugin="com.glideapp.report2"/> </requires> <description> This plugin allows the user to configure and store page headers and footers for PDF reports. </description> </plugin>]]></definition> <description>This plugin allows the user to configure and store page headers and footers for PDF reports.</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help/> <id>com.glideapp.report_page_hdrftr</id> <licensable>false</licensable> <name>Report - PDF Page Header Footer Templates</name> <path>plugin://com.glideapp.report_page_hdrftr/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.glideapp.report,com.glideapp.report2</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.glideapp.report_page_hdrftr</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>false</trackable> <type/> <version>0.1</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Report - PDF Page Header Footer Templates
